last_episode_to_air.name: Reagan
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gloria, Bella and Jill put pressure on the White House to act on their proposals from the National Women’s Conference. Phyllis prepares to leverage her political victories as the 1980 presidential election draws near.

name: Mrs. America
overview: The true story of the movement to ratify the Equal Rights Amendment, and the unexpected backlash led by a conservative woman named Phyllis Schlafly, aka “the sweetheart of the silent majority.”
tagline: What happened to women helping women?

episodes.name: Phyllis
episodes.overview: Conservative activist Phyllis Schlafly considers another run for Congress, amid the women’s movement’s push for passage of the Equal Rights Amendment.

episodes.name: Gloria
episodes.overview: While Phyllis mobilizes grassroots support in her fight against the ERA, Gloria Steinem fends off Bella Abzug’s attempts to drag her further into the political game.

episodes.name: Shirley
episodes.overview: Shirley Chisholm makes a historic run for president, while Gloria struggles to play politics at the DNC. Phyllis takes her new anti-ERA organization national.

episodes.name: Betty
episodes.overview: As Stop ERA grows and gains media attention, Betty Friedan, the mother of the Feminist movement, makes it her mission to take down Phyllis.

episodes.name: Phyllis & Fred & Brenda & Marc
episodes.overview: Phyllis and Fred Schlafly debate superstar Feminist couple Brenda and Marc Feigan-Fasteau on television.

episodes.name: Jill
episodes.overview: With a pro-ERA Republican in the White House, Phyllis protests her own party, which puts her in conflict with Republican Feminist leader, Jill Ruckelshaus.

guest_stars.character: Phyllis Schafly (18 Years Old) / Liza Schafly
guest_stars.name: Olivia Scriven

episodes.name: Bella
episodes.overview: Bella is put in charge of the first ever government-funded National Women's Conference. Phyllis and her women clash over how to best disrupt the conference.

guest_stars.character: Phyllis Schafly (18 Years Old) / Liza Schafly
guest_stars.name: Olivia Scriven

episodes.name: Houston
episodes.overview: Alice, Rosemary and Pamela cross into enemy territory at the National Women's Conference in Houston, where they come face-to-face with Feminist leaders.

episodes.name: Reagan
episodes.overview: Gloria, Bella and Jill put pressure on the White House to act on their proposals from the National Women’s Conference. Phyllis prepares to leverage her political victories as the 1980 presidential election draws near.

guest_stars.character: Phyllis Schafly (18 Years Old) / Liza Schafly
guest_stars.name: Olivia Scriven
